attributes.action: Let England have its own National anthem at sporting events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like Scotland & Wales let England have its own National anthem at sporting events. God save the queen to be sung when Great Britain take part in events. Let the good people of England sing out loud how proud they are of their country and of being English. The Scot`s and the Welsh do why can`t we!!??
